This code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0938 defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinitionV2 Concept CommentV2 Concept Comment As Published
ORD Placing the orderPlacing the orderAt time of placing the orderAt time of placing the order
DRW Collecting the specimenCollecting the specimenWhen the specimen is collected (e.g. fasting status)When the specimen is collected (e.g. fasting status)

name: CollectionEvent
title: collectionEvent
description: HL7-defined code system of concepts specifying the limit for the collection event or process step.  Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging in the OMC segment.
purpose: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0938 (Collection Event/Process Step Limit)
copyright: Copyright HL7. Licensed under creative commons public domain

property.description: Version of HL7 in which the code was deprecated

property.valueString: At time of placing the order
